prompts: Create a playful Normal-type Pokemon with large hands and a mischievous grin.
Imagine a purple Pokemon that loves to swing from trees and play pranks.
Design a bipedal creature with big ears and a long tail, perfect for urban adventures.
Generate a friendly monkey-like Pokemon that has a knack for juggling.
Show me a Pokemon that uses its hands to communicate and express emotions.
Make an adorable Pokemon that thrives in forested areas and loves to socialize.
Give me a character that embodies both agility and charm, with a vibrant purple hue.

distinctive_features: Two large hands with pink fingertips
